title: Btcalysis
author: Btcalysis
content: The bill has been introduced and is expected to be signed. If signed as planned, taxes will become the first state in United States to have bitcoin strategic reserve. He said this would position Texas at the forefront of the digital economy, driving growth and securing economic freedom for our great state.https://x.com/DrSchwertner/status/1879630775835890082?s=19

comments.author: john_egbert
comments.body: As I see in the replies, lots of other figures from other states are thinking the same, in Florida and Oklahoma, at least.Great news, but again - some time is needed and the conclusions would be made to judge what would become of such drafts.
